examples.korean: It would be hazardous to invest so much. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇게 많이 투자를 하는 것은 위험할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would be hazardous to invest so much. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Their investments have appreciated over the years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 세월이 흐르면서 그들이 한 투자의 가치가 올랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their investments have appreciated over the years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Investors reacted positively to news of the takeover. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 투자자들은 그 인수 합병 소식에 긍정적인 반응을 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Investors reacted positively to news of the takeover. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The company is now reaping the rewards of their investments. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 기업은 이제 투자한 데 대한 보상을 거둬들이고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company is now reaping the rewards of their investments. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The company is steaming ahead with its investment programme. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 회사는 투자 프로그램을 빠르게 진척시켜 나가고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
